BR_text.BRsummary: Type check fails on the master branch
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 There seems to currently be a bug on the master branch. The classes  and  in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/blob/master/src/gluonts/shell/__main__.py>src/gluonts/shell/__main__.py</denchmark-link>
  are undefined. Also, I suspect that the argument  in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/gluon-ts/blob/master/src/gluonts/shell/train.py#L102>src/gluonts/shell/train.py</denchmark-link>
   should be of type , not .
 The above two problems break the type check (python setup.py type_check), which results in failed tests for submitted PRs.
 <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 git pull origin master
 python setup.py type_check
 <denchmark-h:h2>Error message or code output</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-code>src/gluonts/shell/train.py:122: error: Unexpected keyword argument "num_workers" for "train" of "Estimator"
 src/gluonts/shell/train.py:122: error: Unexpected keyword argument "num_prefetch" for "train" of "Estimator"
 src/gluonts/shell/train.py:122: error: Unexpected keyword argument "shuffle_buffer_length" for "train" of "Estimator"
 src/gluonts/shell/__main__.py:77: error: Name 'Forecaster' is not defined
 src/gluonts/shell/__main__.py:128: error: Name 'GluonTSForecasterNotFoundError' is not defined
 Found 5 errors in 2 files (checked 133 source files)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 
 Operating system: MacOS
 Python version: 3.7.7
 GluonTS version: 0.5.1.dev69+gd859164
 MXNet version: 1.6.0
